hibernate-mapping.query: select assessmentRating from omis.assessment.domain.AssessmentRating assessmentRating where assessmentRating.min = :min and assessmentRating.max = :max and assessmentRating.sex = :sex and assessmentRating.questionnaireType = :questionnaireType and (assessmentRating.dateRange.startDate = :startDate OR (assessmentRating.dateRange.startDate is null and :startDate is null)) and (assessmentRating.dateRange.endDate = :endDate OR (assessmentRating.dateRange.endDate is null and :endDate is null)) and assessmentRating.category = :ratingCategory and assessmentRating.rank = :ratingRank

select assessmentRating from omis.assessment.domain.AssessmentRating assessmentRating where assessmentRating.min = :min and assessmentRating.max = :max and assessmentRating.sex = :sex and assessmentRating.questionnaireType = :questionnaireType and (assessmentRating.dateRange.startDate = :startDate OR (assessmentRating.dateRange.startDate is null and :startDate is null)) and (assessmentRating.dateRange.endDate = :endDate OR (assessmentRating.dateRange.endDate is null and :endDate is null)) and assessmentRating.category = :ratingCategory and assessmentRating.rank = :ratingRank and assessmentRating <> :excludedAssessmentRating
select assessmentRating from omis.assessment.domain.AssessmentRating assessmentRating where assessmentRating.category = :ratingCategory order by assessmentRating.max asc

select assessmentRating from omis.assessment.domain.AssessmentRating assessmentRating where assessmentRating.category = :ratingCategory and assessmentRating.questionnaireType = :questionnaireType order by assessmentRating.max asc
